title: Congratulating Owego High School student-athlete Devon McFadden upon the occasion of placing first in four events
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION congratulating Owego High School student-athlete
Devon McFadden upon the occasion of placing first in four events at  the
Section 4 Class B Swimming Championships

WHEREAS,  Excellence  and  success in competitive sports can be achieved
only through strenuous practice, team play and team spirit, nurtured  by
dedicated coaching and strategic planning; and
  WHEREAS, Athletic competition enhances the moral and physical develop-
ment of the young people of this State, preparing them for the future by
instilling  in  them  the  value  of teamwork, encouraging a standard of
healthy living, imparting a desire for success and developing a sense of
fair play and competition; and
  WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative Body to recognize and pay
tribute to those young people within the  State  of  New  York  who,  by
achieving outstanding success in athletic competition, have inspired and
brought pride to their school and community; and
  WHEREAS,  Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its long-
standing traditions, this Legislative Body is justly proud to  congratu-
late  Owego High School student-athlete Devon McFadden upon the occasion
of placing first in four events at the Section 4 Class B Swimming  Cham-
pionships; and
  WHEREAS,  Devon  McFadden  was  a winner in four events, including the
200-yard individual medley, the 100 backstroke, and both the 200 and 400
free relays; she helped her team successfully defend their  team  title;
and
  WHEREAS,  In  addition, Devon McFadden broke school records in the 200
IM (2:14.50), 100 backstroke (59.73) and was part of Owego's  school-re-
cord breaking 400 free relay team (3:42.15); she is the second female in
Owego swimming history to qualify for the state meet in four events; and
  WHEREAS,  Devon  McFadden's  overall  record  is  outstanding; she was
loyally and enthusiastically supported by family, fans, friends and  the
community at large; and
  WHEREAS, Sports competition instills the values of teamwork, pride and
accomplishment,  and  Devon  McFadden has clearly made a contribution to
the spirit of excellence which is a tradition of her school; now, there-
fore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
congratulate  Owego  High School student-athlete Devon McFadden upon the
occasion of placing first in four events at the Section 4 Class B  Swim-
ming Championships; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Devon McFadden.
